targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used_percent) as used FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT last("Uptime") FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("BusyWorkers") as "busy",mean("IdleWorkers") as "idle"  FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("CPULoad") as "cpu-load" FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("BytesPerReq") as "bytes-per-req" FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("BytesPerSec") as "bytes-per-sec" FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("ReqPerSec") as "req-per-sec" FROM "apache"  WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("TotalAccesses"),1s) as "total-accesses" FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)

SELECT mean("scboard_closing") as "closing",mean("scboard_dnslookup") as "dnslookup",mean("scboard_finishing") as "finishing",mean("scboard_idle_cleanup") as "idle-cleanup",mean("scboard_keepalive") as "keepalive",mean("scboard_logging") as "logging",mean("scboard_open") as "open",mean("scboard_reading") as "reading",mean("scboard_sending") as "sending",mean("scboard_starting") as "starting",mean("scboard_waiting") as "waiting" FROM "apache" WHERE $timeFilter  AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("active_processes") as "active",mean("idle_processes") as "idle"  FROM "phpfpm" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("accepted_conn"),1s) FROM "phpfpm" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_requests"),1s) FROM "phpfpm" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT mean("max_children_reached") FROM "phpfpm" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("used_cpu_sys")) as "sys" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("used_cpu_user")) as "user" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("used_cpu_sys_children")) as "sys-children" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("used_cpu_user_children")) as "user-children" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_memory_lua") as "lua",mean("used_memory_peak") as "peak",mean("used_memory_rss") as "rss" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("keyspace_hits"),1s) as "hits" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("keyspace_misses"),1s) as "misses" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("keyspace_hitrate") as "hitrate" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("evicted_keys") as "evicted",mean("expired_keys") as "expired" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("instantaneous_ops_per_sec") as "ops" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("clients") as "clients" FROM "redis" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT count(distinct("container_id")) FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY host
SELECT last("n_containers") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_goroutines") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_used_file_descriptors") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("memory_total") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_images") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_packets"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_packets"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_dropped"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_dropped"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_errors"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_errors"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
